msIdentifier.objectName: Touristic guide of the region Brittany, France

imprint.note: No publishing year appears on the brochure, however, it was possible to establish an approximate publishing year according to the clues available throughout the text (e.g. the La Baule harbor, which, created in 1880, which is said to be 25 years old in the guide (p.13)) I therefore approximated that the text of the brochure was written in 1905.

msIdentifier.objectName: Map of the Bretagne region, 1/320.000° scale

altIdentifier.note: The brochure was sold together with a map of the region. The map was not digitized for this project.

hyphenation.p: All end-of-line hyphenation was kept for layout preservation purposes. All hyphens were tagged as pc with the appropriate @force.

quotation.p: All quotations have been tagged as q with the appropriate.

segmentation.p: The text was split into main p elements. ab are also used, with a @part attribute where the text is split across pages or other elements.

correction.p: No spelling mistakes were found, however some punctuation mark errors exist (such as unclosed brackers) which have not been corrected.

punctuation.p: All punctuation marks have been retain as in the original, even unclosed brackets.

normalization.p: The symbols used to represent post offices, train stations and telephones were represented using unicode symbols. As no unicode symbol exists for the telegraph, it is represented by the capital letter T.

revisionDesc.change: Laura Gera TEI encoded the entirety of the guide

div.head: LA BRETAGNE
div.ab: COMPRENANT
UNE CARTE EN 3 COULEURS DE LA BRETAGNE
à l'échelle de 1/320.000e

indiquant les différents états des routes (pavées, macadamisées, montées,
descentss, etc.), les distances kilométriques, passages à niveau, etc., etc.,
ainsi que tous les itinéraires de Paris en Bretagne.

DONNANT TOUS

et les Plans des principales Villes montrant leurs entrées et sorties.

PRIX : UN FRANC
FRANCIS CAMPBELL, Éditeur
24, Passage du Havre, 24
PARIS

div.head: Les Environs de Paris
div.ab: (dans un rayon de 100 à 135 kilomètres), comprenant :

div.p:
a) Une Carte en 4 feuilles et en 4 couleurs, à l'échelle du
1/150,000e, donnant toutes les routes avec l'indication de leur état, les
distances kilométriques, montées, descentes, voies ferrées, passages à
niveau , voies fluviales, villes, villages, hameaux, bois et forêts.

b) Un Guide pratique et 30 plans de ville avec les entrées et sorties,
et la direction des routes.

CARTES MURALES

Les 4 sections réunies, montées sur toile et vernies
